ygData.subject: Re: Hey all
ygData.msgSnippet: I am really curious about a few things here.   I am real familiar with West Commons as I also play other classes and races.  There really is not a lot in W.
ygData.messageBody:
I am really curious about a few things here. I am real familiar with West
Commons as I also play other classes and races. There really is not a lot
in W. Commons except for the orc camps if I remember correctly. I do not
think Yilari is ready to solo wisps or asps yet. Giant spiders and
grizzlies are also a problem. There is the one undead ruin but it is
heavily camped if I recall correctly.

I can see N. Ro if a group is available though. What is all in N. Ro? I
know there are a lot of tarantulas and scarabs and some undead as well as
the dervish camps and madmen. A few orc camps as well if I recall
correctly.

A lot to think about for sure. Steamfront is off of L. Fay isn't it?

Thanks for the suggestions,
Yilari




> From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>
>
> Try solo-ing the skeletons in steamfont. Just be sure you get one by
> itself, because others will come help. And the loot is way better
> than chessboard, anyway. Or you might find low-teens groups here
> fighting elementals or minos, or the various other stuff that wanders
> this zone. I'm sure they would like having a cleric in their group.
>
> Of course, there are other suggestions, such as qeynos hills, or
> the sewers, or blackburrow, or north ro, or west commons, or misty
> thicket... but since you are on Faydwar, try Steamfont.
>
> Ergo Soulhealer
> 20th level high elf cleric
> test server
>
>
> >From: "Walt Zimbeck" <wzimbeck@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> >Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Hey all
> >Date: Fri, 12 Nov 1999 09:02:35 -0600
> >
> >I also seem to have this trouble finding a group even though I will heal
> >anyone that I see hurt whether in combat or just resting. I think it
is
> >mainly my level though on my part. It seems to me that most people wish
to
> >solo yet at 10th - 12th level. I am really getting very discouraged as
I
> >have been level 10 for weeks now. It seems that every time I get a bar
of
> >exp I die a couple of times and lose it.
> >
> >I hunt normally either in ButcherBlock or around the entrance to
CrushBone.
> >It seems that BB is mostly deserted when I am around and there is nothing
> >for me to hunt there. I have hunted the Chess Board a couple of times
when
> >I was able to find a group. The orcs around the CB entrance are either
> >low
> >green (no exp) or else there are 3 or more at once on me and that is
death
> >for sure.
> >
> >Any suggestions would be appreciated.
> >
> >A very frustrated Cleric of Tunare
> >Yilari
> >
> >
> >
> > > From: "Chrisstauf k" <chrisstauf@...>
> > >
> > > You know..I see these messages every no and then about cant find a
group
> >and
> > > just cannot understand it. No matter where I have been I have always
> >been
> > > welcomed into a group within a matter of minutes. Sometimes It would
> >take
> >a
> > > little work on my part. Such as casting buffs and heals on passer bys
or
> > > what not. Here is the line that I use. "Cleric of the X circle seeks
> >group
> > > to heal in battle". seems to work great for me. Who would'nt want a
> >cleric?
> > >
> > > Chrisstauf Healingsoul of the Lightbringer Guild

> > > Karana Server

> >WOW
> > > >have things changed. I was in High Hold going to East Co and had to
go
> > > >through Kichlor Forest. I almost died trying to get through. I
didnt
> >know
> > > >they changed that area. DAMN!!!!!! Anyway.... The reason I decided
> >to
> > > >leave because I couldnt find a group in any of the places. I still
> >couldnt
> > > >believe noone wanted a cleric in their group. Well I am level 25 and

> >just
> > > >wondering where can I hunt? The best places that a cleric will feel
> > > >welcomed, and if you say unrest no way!!!! Thanks guys :)
> > > >
